name: image-sharpener
title: Image Sharpener
description: Enhance image sharpness for clearer details
content:
Overview

This application enhances image sharpness to bring out details and improve clarity. Built using Pillow, it applies a professional-grade sharpening filter to make your images crisper and more defined.

Features

  • Professional sharpening algorithm
  • Adjustable intensity (default: 1 pass)
  • Preserves original file format
  • Optimized quality settings

Parameters

  • Input Image: Upload your image file from stash
  • Output Directory: Select or create a stash folder for output

Output

The application generates a sharpened image with the suffix _sharpened in the specified output directory.

Use Cases

  • Enhancing slightly blurry photos
  • Improving detail visibility
  • Preparing images for printing
  • Restoring clarity to compressed images
